thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 11 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hainan Poly Pharm sees FY 2017 net profit to up 37 pct to 41 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hainan Poly Pharm sees FY 2017 net profit to up 37 pct to 41 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - hainan poly pharm co ltd

text:
Jan 12(Reuters) - Hainan Poly Pharm Co Ltd :
* Says net profit for FY 2017 to up 37 percent to 41 percent, or to be 95.7 million yuan to 98.3 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 69.8 million yuan
* Says increased sales revenue as main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/YCKNtz
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
